data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Luke Berry is booked for the away team.
In the minute 41, Gustavo Hamer (Coventry) has received a yellow card from Andy Woolmer.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Liam Kelly (Coventry) gets a yellow card.
Nathan Jones is making the team's first substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall replacing Luke Berry.
The home team replace Callum O`Hare with Jordan Shipley.
In the minute 85, Sam Nombe is replacing Harry Cornick for Luton at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Amadou Bakayoko is replacing Tyler Walker for the home team.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
